title: Prepare a Backup Offer
description: A buyer wants to make an offer on a property that is already under contract. The agent needs to prepare it as a backup offer.

tasks.description: Draft the standard purchase agreement with the buyer's desired terms.
tasks.expected_outcome: The main offer form is filled out correctly.

tasks.description: Include a 'Backup Offer Addendum' that specifies the offer is secondary to the one already in place.
tasks.expected_outcome: The correct legal addendum for a backup offer is attached to the main contract.

tasks.description: Explain the terms of the backup addendum to the buyer before they sign, ensuring they understand their position.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent clearly communicates that the offer only becomes active if the first contract fails.
